message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
That's a bit steep for me. I'm interested, but I'm only willing to pay $80 for it. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about $120?
I appreciate you coming down, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to go up to $100. Let's see if we can make this work.
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $100, but I'm willing to make another compromise. How about $115?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I'm still hoping we can find a middle ground. How about $105? This is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $110?
I'm going to have to stick with my previous offer of $105. This is my final price. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider my options.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $110, but I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. How about I include a free accessory with the purchase?
